      • getPending

        public java.util.List<ApprovalInfo> getPending()
        Retrieves all pending approval requests. Convenience method to list and retrieve all pending approval requests.

        API Call: GET /api/approvals/pending

        Returns:
        All pending approval requests.

      • approve

        public ApprovalInfo approve(java.lang.String id,
                   java.lang.String message)
        Approves an approval request.

        API Call: POST /api/approvals/{id}/approve

        Parameters:
        id - Approval request ID to approve.
        message - Approval message.
        Returns:
        Approval request information.

      • reject

        public ApprovalInfo reject(java.lang.String id,
                  java.lang.String message)
        Rejects an approval request.

        API Call: POST /api/approvals/{id}/reject

        Parameters:
        id - Approval request ID to reject.
        message - Rejection message.
        Returns:
        Approval request information.
